00019 #ifndef _IPL98_VECTOR3D_H
00020 #define _IPL98_VECTOR3D_H
00021 
00022 #include "../../../points/point3d.h"
00023 #include <iostream>
00024 
00025 namespace ipl{ // use namespace if C++
00026 
00037 template<class T>
00038 class CVector3D : public CPoint3D<T>
00039 {
00040         public: // attributes
00041         private: // attributes
00042         public: // methods
00044                 CVector3D();
00046                 CVector3D(T x,T y,T z);
00048                 template<class POLY> inline CVector3D(const CVector3D<POLY>& V3D){m_x=V3D.GetX();m_y=V3D.GetY();m_z=V3D.GetZ();}
00050                 template<class POLY> inline CVector3D(const CPoint3D<POLY>& P3D){m_x=P3D.GetX();m_y=P3D.GetY();m_z=P3D.GetZ();}
00051 
00053                 template<class POLY> operator CVector3D<POLY>(){return CVector3D<POLY>(m_x,m_y,m_z);}
00054 
00057 
00058                 template<class POLY> inline CVector3D<T>& operator=(const CVector3D<POLY>& V3D){m_x=V3D.GetX();m_y=V3D.GetY();m_z=V3D.GetZ();return *this;};
00060                 template<class POLY> inline CVector3D<T>& operator+=(const CVector3D<POLY>& V3D){m_x+=V3D.GetX();m_y+=V3D.GetY();m_z+=V3D.GetZ();return *this;};
00062                 template<class POLY> inline CVector3D<T>& operator-=(const CVector3D<POLY>& V3D){m_x-=V3D.GetX();m_y-=V3D.GetY();m_z-=V3D.GetZ();return *this;};
00065                 template<class POLY> inline CVector3D<T>& operator*=(const POLY& Factor){m_x*=Factor;m_y*=Factor;m_z*=Factor;return *this;}
00068                 template<class POLY> inline CVector3D<T>& operator/=(const POLY& Factor){m_x/=Factor;m_y/=Factor;m_z/=Factor;return *this;}
00070 
00072 
00073                 template<class POLY> inline bool operator==(const CVector3D<POLY>& V3D) const{return ((m_x==V3D.GetX()) && (m_y==V3D.GetY()) && (m_z==V3D.GetZ()));}
00075                 template<class POLY> inline bool operator!=(const CVector3D<T>& V3D) const{return ((m_x!=V3D.GetX()) || (m_y!=V3D.GetY()) || (m_z!=V3D.GetZ()));}
00077 
00079 
00080                 template<class POLY> inline CVector3D<T> operator+(const CVector3D<POLY>& V3D) const{return CVector3D<T>(m_x+V3D.GetX(),m_y+V3D.GetY(),m_z+V3D.GetZ());}
00082                 template<class POLY> inline CVector3D<T> operator-(const CVector3D<POLY>& V3D) const{return CVector3D<T>(m_x-V3D.GetX(),m_y-V3D.GetY(),m_z-V3D.GetZ());}
00089                 inline T operator*(const CVector3D<T>& Vector) const {return (m_x*Vector.GetX()+m_y*Vector.GetY()+m_z*Vector.GetZ());}
00092                 template<class POLY> inline CVector3D<T> operator*(const POLY& Factor) const {return CVector3D<T>(m_x*Factor,m_y*Factor,m_z*Factor);}
00095                 template<class POLY> inline CVector3D<T> operator/(const POLY& Factor) const {return CVector3D<T>(m_x/Factor,m_y/Factor,m_z/Factor);}
00097                 
00101                 friend CVector3D<T> operator*(const T& Factor,const CVector3D<T>& V3D);
00102                 
00103                 
00107                 template<class POLY> inline T GetDot(const POLY& Vector) const {return (m_x*Vector.GetX()+m_y*Vector.GetY()+m_z*Vector.GetZ());}
00110                 inline double GetModulus() const;
00115                 inline T GetXYAngle() const;
00118                 inline T GetZAngle() const;
00125                 template<class POLY> inline double GetAngle(const CVector3D<POLY>& Vec) const {T p=GetDot(Vec)/(GetModulus()*Vec.GetModulus());return atan2(sqrt(1-p*p),p);}
00129                 template<class POLY> inline CVector3D<T> GetProjection(const CVector3D<POLY>& Vec) const {return Vec*GetDot(Vec)/(Vec.GetX()*Vec.GetX()+Vec.GetY()*Vec.GetY()+Vec.GetZ()*Vec.GetZ());}
00133                 template<class POLY> inline CVector3D<T> GetCross(const CVector3D<POLY>& Vec) const {return CVector3D<T>(m_y*Vec.m_z-m_z*Vec.m_y, m_z*Vec.m_x-m_x*Vec.m_z, m_x*Vec.m_y-m_y*Vec.m_x);}
00136                 inline bool IsZero() const;
00140                 template<class POLY> inline bool IsParallel(const CVector3D<POLY>& Vec) const{return GetDeterminant(Vec)==0;}
00144                 template<class POLY> inline bool IsOrthogonal(const CVector3D<POLY>& Vec) const{return GetDot(Vec)==0;}
00148                 inline bool Normalize(){T L=GetModulus();if (L!=0){m_x/=L;m_y/=L;m_z/=L;return true;}else{return false;}}
00149 };
00150 
00154 
00155 template <class T>
00156 inline T CVector3D<T>::GetXYAngle() const
00157 {
00158         return atan2(m_y, m_x);
00159 }
00160 
00161 template <class T>
00162 inline T CVector3D<T>::GetZAngle() const
00163 {
00164          return atan2(m_z,sqrt(m_x*m_x + m_y*m_y));
00165 }
00166 
00167 template <class T>
00168 inline double CVector3D<T>::GetModulus() const
00169 {
00170         return sqrt(m_x*m_x+m_y*m_y+m_z*m_z);
00171 }
00172 
00173 template <class T>
00174 inline bool CVector3D<T>::IsZero() const
00175 {
00176         return ((m_x==T(0)) && (m_y==T(0)) && (m_z==T(0)));
00177 }
00178 
00179 template <class T>
00180 CVector3D<T> operator*(const T& Factor,const CVector3D<T>& V3D)
00181 {
00182         return CVector3D<T>(V3D.GetX()*Factor,V3D.GetY()*Factor,V3D.GetZ()*Factor);
00183 }
00184

00187 } // end namespace ipl
